name: Demetria, Daughter of Dora of Cisae

traits.appearance: has a distinctive posture (crooked or rigid)
traits.abilities: is hardy, hale, and healthy, but is dim-witted and slow

personality.mannerism: Uses big words to sound intelligent but uses incorrectly
personality.interaction: is curious about one member of the Party

voice.vocals: Speaks Normally, at a Low pitch.
